summary: A teenage werewolf is torn between honoring her family's secret and her love for a man.
cast: Agnes Bruckner|Hugh Dancy|Olivier Martinez|Katja Riemann|Bryan Dick|Chris Geere|Tom Harper|John Kerr|Jack Wilson|Vitalie Ursu|Bogdan Voda|Kata Dobó|Rodica Mandache|Sandu Mihai Gruia|Helga Racz|Lia Bugnar|Mihai Calin|Sofia Vladu|David Finti|Anatole Taubman|Pete Lee-Wilson|Maria Dinulescu|Raluca Aprodu|Simona Cuciurianu|Alexandru Barba|Romeo Raicu|Iulian Pana|Tudor Istodor|Mihai Dinvale|Florin Busuioc|Jasmin Tabatabai|Silviu Sanda|Cristian Anca|Razvan Gorcinski|Dan Mihai Leompescu|Cristi Dimitriu|Samela A. title: La marca del lobo
